subject: Education
subcategory: Great Teachers Who Changed the World
title: Sal Khan: One Man, One Camera, 180 Million Students
description: A quick win: understand Sal Khan: One Man, One Camera, 180 Million Students.

hook.text: Sal Khan started tutoring his cousin via YouTube in 2004. Today, Khan Academy has 180 million registered users in 190

buildup.text: Khan's innovation: free, short video lessons that students can pause, rewind, and rewatch. No shame in needing

discovery.text: The 'flipped classroom' model: watch lectures at home, do practice at school with teacher help. Khan made it possible.

twist.text: Khan quit his hedge fund job to teach for free. He walked away from millions to give lessons away for nothing.

climax.text: Khan proved that one person with a camera can educate more students than every university in the world combined.

punchline.text: The largest school in the world started as a YouTube video for one cousin.

quiz.question: What made Khan Academy revolutionary?
options: Free, replayable video lessons accessible to anyone globally
